description.narrative: Boys, girls and families from excluded populations with increased participation in institutional fora, knowledge and skills to demand their rights.

sector.narrative: Adolescents participating in or leading civic engagement initiatives (including in humanitarian settings)
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
System strengthening for adolescent participation and civic engagement (including in humanitarian settings)

title.narrative: Brazil Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Enhanced Policies for Excluded Children)
UNICEF Programmes in Brazil (Citizen engagement and participation)
"UNICEF Programmes in Brazil (Policies Monitoring and Cooperations)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Boys, girls and families from excluded populations with increased participation in institutional fora, knowledge and skills to demand their rights.

description.narrative: Methodologies to expand the participation of boys, girls and families from excluded groups in institutional forums and increase their knowledge and skills to demand their rights were piloted in the three most vulnerable regions of Brazil: The Amazon, the Semiarid and the outskirts of large urban centers. These practices started to be systematized so that they can be disseminated in 2020. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/02/2020

title.narrative: Percentage of most vulnerable municipalities participating in the Municipal Seal that organize two community forums including the participation of children, adolescents and families

target.value: 2021:25% of most vulnerable municipalities participating in the Municipal Seal that organize two community forums with the participation of children, adolescents and families
